org.xbib.marc.json

Class MarcJsonWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.marc.xml.MarcContentHandler
      • org.xbib.marc.json.MarcJsonWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, MarcListener, MarcRecordListener, MarcXchangeConstants, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class MarcJsonWriter
extends MarcContentHandler
implements java.io.Flushable, java.io.Closeable
    This Marc Writer is a MarcContentHandler that writes Marc events to JSON.
